original_prompt: You are given a question. You need to detect which category better describes the question. A question belongs to the description category if it asks about description and abstract concepts. Entity questions are about entities such as animals, colors, sports, etc. Abbreviation questions ask about abbreviations and expressions abbreviated. Questions regarding human beings, description of a person, and a group or organization of persons are categorized as Human. Quantity questions are asking about numeric values and Location questions ask about locations, cities, and countries. Answer with "Description", "Entity", "Abbreviation", "Person", "Quantity", and "Location".
generated_prompts: Given a question, your task is to detect which category best describes it. Questions asking about description and abstract concepts belong to the description category. Questions about entities such as animals, colors, sports, etc. are considered entity questions. Abbreviation questions ask about abbreviations and expressions abbreviated. Questions regarding human beings, description of a person, and a group or organization of persons are categorized as Human. Quantity questions ask about numeric values and Location questions ask about locations, cities, and countries. Output one of the following: "Description", "Entity", "Abbreviation", "Person", "Quantity", and "Location".

You are given a question. Your task is to determine which category best describes the question. Questions that ask about description and abstract concepts are categorized as "Description". Questions that ask about entities such as animals, colors, sports, etc. are categorized as "Entity". Questions that ask about abbreviations and expressions abbreviated are categorized as "Abbreviation". Questions regarding human beings, description of a person, and a group or organization of persons are categorized as "Human". Questions that ask about numeric values are categorized as "Quantity" and questions that ask about locations, cities, and countries are categorized as "Location". Output one of these six categories.
